settings.title: Who is Slick the Rabbit?
settings.text: Crafted from the finest natural ingredients on the planet, Slickhare was established to create the best a man can get from a hair product. Born from the city but from humble beginnings, slick knows what it takes to be the coolest rabbit in the room. From stylish, classy easy-going looks with the matte texture cream, or messy undone devil may care texture with the styling clay, each product was designed to fit the daily needs your hair has been looking for. Whether it’s a night out on the town, or another day at work, Slick the rabbit will always make sure you’ll be able to tame your hair.

settings.heading: Reach us
settings.discription:
6185 Magnolia Ave, Suite 51,
Riverside, CA, 92506.
settings.copyright: Copyright © 2020 | All rights are reserved | Contact us

settings.title: Natural Matte Finish
settings.discription: High hold with little to no shine. The texture cream leaves your hair looking natural and groomed all day.

settings.title: Natural-based, Hair health Ingredients
settings.discription: Made with beeswax, castor oil, and lanolin, our goal was to give you the most natural based ingredients without compromising your look. Paraben and sulfate free.

settings.title: Citrus Fragrance
settings.discription: Based with grapefruit shea extract, slickhare leaves your hair smelling clean and fresh all day, without the worry of allergies or headaches.

settings.title: Water Soluable
settings.discription: Our water-based products guarantee our product will easily wash out of your hair, eliminating the stress of having clumpy, gross hair!

settings.title: Reworkable Hair
settings.discription: No need to worry about what your hair will look like during the day, slickhare was designed for you to able to re work it without losing your style!

settings.text: We offer 100% money back guarantee on all of our products LIFETIME. If you are ever unsatisfied with your product, let us know, it is our pleasure to make it right for your needs.

settings.title: Create a healthy head of hair.
settings.text: Slickhare promotes healthy hair growth. By using all-natural ingredients, the texture cream allows your hair follicles to breathe without making your scalp oily or build up with debris, creating a healthy head of hair reducing the risk of hair loss. Most men's hair products block the subcutaneous layer, whereas our products coat your hair shaft, instead of irritating your scalp. Using Slickhare will actually prevent you from losing your existing hair while, all while promoting new growth.

settings.quote: I purchased Slickhare for my fiance who is always struggling to find products with a good hold for his thick, unruly textured hair. Upon his first use he exclaimed he had found his unicorn of hair products. The product is lightweight with a strong hold while remaining flexible. 10/10 will buy again

settings.text: Our brand new collection has arrived, don’t be late! Buy our finest natural hair products at reasonable prices with a fast delivery service today.

settings.title: Extreme Hold:
